comment: The men with Kashnikovs shooting at journalist in office are COWARDS. Nobody in world will ever respect them.
amr:
# ::snt The men with Kashnikovs shooting at journalist in office are COWARDS. Nobody in world will ever respect them.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / coward
            :domain (m2 / man
                  :ARG0-of (s / shoot-02
                        :ARG2 (j / journalist)
                        :location (o / office))
                  :poss (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Kashnikov"))))
      :snt2 (r / respect-01
            :ARG0 (n2 / nobody
                  :location (w / world))
            :ARG1 (t / they)
            :time (e / ever)))

# ::snt except their radical brethren
(e / except-01
      :ARG1 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                  :ARG1 (t / they)
                  :ARG2 (b / brethren))
            :ARG1-of (r / radical-02)))

# ::snt b voil une piste dj
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (v / voil-
            :mode expressive
            :mod (d / dj))
      :ARG2 (p / person))
